Determined based on the type of the source.

The placement of a person in contributor vs creator is determined by complex logic. If the person is also listed in spase:ResourceHeader/spase:PublicationInfo/spase:Authors, then the person is listed as a creator. If this SPASE field is filled, then the remaining indicated people are listed as contributors except for those with "Contact" or similar associated Roles. If the SPASE author field is empty, then the Contacts in the SPASE record are listed as creators if they have certain associated roles, contributor for lesser roles, and not mapped for contact-related roles.
The value is retrieved from the indicated field from the Person record for the personID indicated.
